thread.title: An Oasis of Calm, Steps from Times Square
thread.title_full: An Oasis of Calm, Steps from Times Square - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Del A
title: An Oasis of Calm, Steps from Times Square
text: We picked the Casablanca for a long-weekend family getaway in Manhattan and enjoyed every minute of it. Attentive staff, well appointed classic furnishings, great breakfast buffet and serene wine and cheese in he evenings...all just steps from Times Square. Tony Di Napoli restaurant right next door for enjoyable, sit-down dining. Close to the trains with connections to LGA JFK or EWR. A gem. Pick an inside courtyard room as they are cones of silence.
